channel.title: Postgres Changelog
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Postgres.app 2.9.2
item.description:
• PostgreSQL 13.23 with PostGIS 3.1.12
  • PostgreSQL 14.20 with PostGIS 3.2.8
  • PostgreSQL 15.15 with PostGIS 3.3.8
  • PostgreSQL 16.11 with PostGIS 3.4.4
  • PostgreSQL 17.7 with PostGIS 3.5.4
  • PostgreSQL 18.1 with PostGIS 3.6.1

If you are still using PostgreSQL 13, please upgrade soon. This update will probably be the last to support PostgreSQL 13.

You can find more info on the Github Releases Page.
